title: You can't expose a player, but can you expose a "team"?
body:
There's these group of people under a same team group that all they do is being toxic - I've played with several members of that group and all do the same, buy weird items or feed and become toxic... the thing is.. the do it in RANK games.
 I know you can't expose a player, but are we allowed to expose a group?

replies.body:
In short, no. It falls under the same naming and shaming rules as individuals. If you want to report these players you can submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Riot don't allow public reporting on their boards for multiple reasons, including but not limited to witch-hunting, false claims and only having one side of the story. The only exception to the rule is confirmed bots.
